title: Cu2NiSnS4/g-C3N4 S-scheme Photocatalysts: Interfacial Surface Trap States vs Hydrogen Production
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00744A, Paper
Rugma TP, Rishi Krishna, K. Priyanga Kangeyan, Bernaurdshaw Neppolian, Abd-Allah Alarifi, Sandeep Kumar Lakhera
Graphitic carbon nitride (g-C3N4), a two-dimensional semiconducting material, shows promise in energy conversion but faces challenges such as rapid charge carrier recombination and poor visible-light absorption. To address these issues,...
